85313.summary: Some customers in the Tuxedo area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
85313.title: Dec 11 - Winnipeg (Tuxedo) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

85314.summary: Some customers in the Confederation Park area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
85314.title: Dec 11 - Saskatoon (Confederation Park) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
